articles.author: Mark Gurman
articles.title: Apple Debuts AirPods Pro 3 With Pulse Monitoring, Better Fit - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Apple Inc. introduced its first new AirPods Pro model in three years, adding new health-tracking features, live translation capabilities, improved noise cancellation and a better fit.
articles.content:

articles.title: Apple announces iOS 26 release date: September 15 - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple has announced the official release date for iOS 26, its next major software update for all users with a supported iPhone.
